knowledgeBase.about: Bright Smile Dental is a modern dental practice serving the Madison, Ohio area since 2010. We provide comprehensive dental care for the whole family in a comfortable, friendly environment.
services: General Dentistry - Cleanings, fillings, and preventive care
Cosmetic Dentistry - Teeth whitening, veneers, and smile makeovers
Oral Surgery - Tooth extractions and wisdom teeth removal
Emergency Dental Care - Same-day appointments for urgent issues
Pediatric Dentistry - Specialized care for children

faqs.question: What are your office hours?
faqs.answer: We're open Monday-Thursday 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM, Friday 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM, and Saturday 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM for emergencies.

faqs.question: Do you accept my insurance?
faqs.answer: We accept most major dental insurance plans including Delta Dental, Cigna, MetLife, and Aetna. Call us at (440) 555-0123 to verify your specific plan.

faqs.question: How much does a cleaning cost?
faqs.answer: A routine cleaning typically costs $150-200 without insurance. With insurance, most patients pay $0-50 depending on their plan.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer CareCredit financing with 0% interest for 6-12 months on treatments over $200. We also have in-house payment plans.

faqs.question: How do I schedule an appointment?
faqs.answer: You can call us at (440) 555-0123, or use our online booking system on our website. New patients can also text 'SMILE' to 44055.

faqs.question: What should I do for a dental emergency?
faqs.answer: For dental emergencies during business hours, call us immediately at (440) 555-0123. After hours, call our emergency line at (440) 555-0199.

faqs.question: Do you treat children?
faqs.answer: Yes! We love kids and see children starting at age 2. Our pediatric dentist, Dr. Sarah Johnson, specializes in making dental visits fun and comfortable for children.

faqs.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
faqs.answer: Most patients should visit every 6 months for cleanings and checkups. Some patients with gum disease or other conditions may need to come every 3-4 months.

faqs.question: Is teeth whitening safe?
faqs.answer: Yes, professional teeth whitening is safe when supervised by a dentist. We offer both in-office Zoom whitening (1 hour) and take-home custom trays.

faqs.question: Where are you located?
faqs.answer: We're located at 123 Main Street, Madison, Ohio 44057. We're in the Madison Plaza, next to the Walgreens.

policies.cancellation: Please provide 24 hours notice for cancellations to avoid a $50 fee
policies.newPatients: New patients receive a free consultation and 20% off their first treatment
policies.insurance: We file insurance claims for you and accept assignment of benefits
policies.guarantee: We guarantee our work for 2 years on all fillings and crowns
